snippet: Lewis Hamilton drove his McLaren Mercedes to a dominating victory at the Italian Grand Prix, and the race was full of other interesting plots and angles as well, which befits the current Formula One season.
abstract: Lewis Hamilton drove his McLaren Mercedes to a dominating victory at the Italian Grand Prix, and the race was full of other interesting plots and angles as well, which befits the current Formula One season.

headline.main: In Monza, a Race That Resembles the Season
